import React from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBoxOpen, faCartArrowDown, faChartPie, faChevronDown, faClipboard, faCommentDots, faFileAlt, faPlus, faRocket, faStore } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Col, Row, Button, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { ChoosePhotoWidget, ProfileCardWidget } from "../components/Widgets"; import { GeneralInfoForm } from "../components/Forms"; import Profile3 from "../assets/img/team/profile-picture-3.jpg"; export default () => { return ( <>
New Document Message Product Subscription Plan
Reports Products Customers Orders Console All Reports
); };
